website_summaries.verdict: Teva’s Hurricane XLT Infinity pleases the female hiking community with its performance on and off the trails. Those who love venturing the outdoors—from city streets to trails—may truly enjoy its versatility. Its surprisingly supportive and comfortable overall build was also recognized. However, it seems to fail from a few design issues—with straps loosening and not being adjustable. Taking everything into account the pros of Hurricane XLT Infinity may be able to offset its cons.
pros: The comfort provided by the Hurricane XLT Infinity satisfied numerous online buyers
Hordes of female reviewers commented that they received a lot of compliments because of its stylish design
The versatility of this hiking sandal impressed the majority
Some even noted that it worked excellently on all occasions
Scores of users approved of its lightness
The support from this Teva sandal surprised an abundance of consumers
A huge portion of those who bought the Hurricane XLT Infinity appreciated the thin straps
They mentioned that it did not leave marks on their foot
Its comfort right out of the box amazed a large percentage of verified purchasers
Several brand loyalists stated that they bought another pair of the Hurricane XLT Infinity as they were amazed by its performance
The wide toe box of this footgear delighted plenty of wearers, especially those who have bunions
cons: The straps of the Hurricane XLT Infinity from Teva disappointed many customers
They declared that it was tight at first, but after a couple of uses, it became loose-fitting
A considerable number of owners disliked the straps that can’t be adjusted

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for skinny feet
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was comfortable but I had issues with my feet sliding forward when I walked. It fit well but the elastic of top part just didn’t hold foot in place. Also, the base is super wide. Good I suppose if your doing a lot of hiking or on a surface that would benefit from a wider base. I wanted to like these shoes but they just aren’t meant for thin, narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Cyberfish

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They were comfortable the first time I wore them didn’t have to break them in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sandals for fun and exploring
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these sandals. I have used them daily to do short walks around the neighborhood with my dog, as well as longer walks and even easy hikes... Including going into a creek/waterfall with get completely submerged! The longest I've walked since I purchased these was 2.5 miles. I didn't experience any soreness in my feet (and I am usually a complainer when it comes to shoes). They are so light and comfortable! Definitely my most useful purchase this summer. I love the purple color and am considering buying another pair in another color to switch off with.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Berlin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SUPPORT AND ATTRACTIVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much that I have them in 3 colors. They have great support but still seriously cute. The first full day I wore my 1st pair I walked more than 10 miles ... all of them in comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Imppressive
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I'm barefoot! I love the design - completely adjustable bungee-type straps. Sole is very flexible. Would like a bit more arch support... but overall great shoe for walking, etc.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Roomy for sure
customer_reviews.text: I guess it depends on how you like your shoes to fit, but I'm a normal 9.5 and got a 9, and STILL had plentyyyyyy of room in these that it felt like too much to me, so much so that I exchanged them for an 8. An 8 exactly fits my foot on the sandal but that's weirdly how I like it? Lol anyways once I got the sizing down I love them!! Super comfy, functional and look great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable sandals. Love the purple. Good fit. SandLs feel good from the first day on.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen H

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals for a woman with a slender foot
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly for any size foot. I love them because I have a slender foot and sandals are always tooo wide. These stretch to any foot size. Perfect for the active woman.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo M

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Sandals fit as I expected and I love them! A little looser around my feet which is great since I’m on my feet a lot! These are great if you don’t like traditional Teva sandals with the velcro straps (they would cut into my feet)
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and sturdy! I feel like I'm walking on clouds.
customer_reviews.author: Keshia Childs

customer_reviews.title: Love them ! Super Confortable
customer_reviews.text: They are super comfortable I can go hiking with them ! They are The Best !
customer_reviews.author: Delmy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sandals ever
customer_reviews.text: Favorite sandals I’ve ever had. Durable, comfortable, and wash really easily. I was worried that the straps would stretch out but nope! I have them in 2 colors and will most likely order more. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Langston

product_meta.title: Teva Women's W Hurricane XLT Infinity Sandal
product_meta.description: An elegant Infinity upper crafted from a single piece of lightweight webbing meets the crazy comfort of our classic Hurricane xlt for a sandal that walks the line between fashion and go-everywhere function.
feature_bullets: Water resistant spun Poly stretch lace that is soft against the skin
Rugged Durabrasion Rubber outsole is extremely durable and supplies great traction
Nylon shank stabilizes and supports your foot on uneven terrain
